text: Samuel D. Felker was an American Democratic Party politician who served as governor of New Hampshire from 1913 to 1915. During his time as governor time he pursued a reform agenda. Much of this agenda, which included a large number of social and economic measures, was approved by the legislature.Governors and the Progressive Movement by David R. Berman, 2019, P.193 ==References== Category:Governors of New Hampshire Category:Members of the New Hampshire General Court Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Samuel D. Felker
